unit.name: This offering of prayer is to be said daily, where possible in the context of Morning or Evening Prayer.

segment.source: This offering of prayer is to be said daily, where possible in the context of Morning or Evening Prayer.
segment.target: 这祈祷的祭献应每日遵行，可视情况而安排于早、晚祷之中。

unit.name: In the Province of the Pacific, pray for Tertiaries in the Solomon Islands of Guadalcanal and Savo.

segment.source: In the Province of the Pacific, pray for Tertiaries in the Solomon Islands of Guadalcanal and Savo.
segment.target: 对于太平洋会省，为所罗门群岛瓜达尔卡纳尔和萨沃的第三会会友祈祷。

unit.name: I-pray-for-you

notes.note: Can be an empty string, if it returns 'I-pray-for-you' then it will be excluded

segment.source: I-pray-for-you
segment.target: I-pray-for-you

unit.name: God, your love led Francis and Clare to establish our three orders: draw us deeper into that same love, that we may grow in love towards all, for the sake of your son Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: God, your love led Francis and Clare to establish our three orders: draw us deeper into that same love, that we may grow in love towards all, for the sake of your son Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 上帝啊，你的圣爱引导圣法兰西斯和圣克莱尔为我们建立了这三个修会团体：求你也吸引我们，进入你的圣爱之中，使我们在这爱里成长，以至爱我们身边所有的人，正如基督爱世人一样。这都是因你的圣子耶稣基督。

unit.name: Lord, without you our labour is wasted, but with you all who are weak can find strength: pour your Spirit on the Society of Saint Francis; give your labourers a pure intention, patient faith, sufficient success on earth, and the joy of serving you in heaven; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: Lord, without you our labour is wasted, but with you all who are weak can find strength: pour your Spirit on the Society of Saint Francis; give your labourers a pure intention, patient faith, sufficient success on earth, and the joy of serving you in heaven; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 主啊，若没有你，我们一切的劳苦都是枉然，但藉着你，所有软弱的人必得以刚强：求你将你的灵浇灌在圣法兰西斯会中，将纯全的意愿和坚忍的信心赐给你的仆人，使我们在地上可以完全得胜，在天上也能因服侍你而满怀喜乐。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: Amen

segment.source: Amen
segment.target: 阿们。

unit.name: deceased-member

segment.source: deceased-member
segment.target: deceased-member

unit.name: God, you are always pleased to show yourself to those who are childlike and humble in spirit: help us to follow the example of our blessed father Francis, to look upon the wisdom of this world as foolishness, and to set our minds only on Christ Jesus and him crucified; to whom with you and the Holy Spirit be all glory for ever.

segment.source: God, you are always pleased to show yourself to those who are childlike and humble in spirit: help us to follow the example of our blessed father Francis, to look upon the wisdom of this world as foolishness, and to set our minds only on Christ Jesus and him crucified; to whom with you and the Holy Spirit be all glory for ever.
segment.target: 上帝啊，你乐意显示自己给谦卑虚己、像小孩子一样的心灵：求你帮助我们，效法蒙福的会父圣法兰西斯的榜样，将世界的智慧看为愚拙，而只愿思想耶稣基督并他钉十字架。圣子和圣父、圣灵，共享尊荣，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God, you resist the proud and give grace to the humble: help us not to think proudly, but to serve you with the humility that pleases you, so we may walk in the steps of your servant Francis and receive the gift of your grace; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: God, you resist the proud and give grace to the humble: help us not to think proudly, but to serve you with the humility that pleases you, so we may walk in the steps of your servant Francis and receive the gift of your grace; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 上帝啊，你抵挡骄傲的人，赐恩给谦卑的人：求你帮助我们，免除骄傲的意念，而以谦卑服侍你，行你所喜悦的事，求你使我们跟随你的仆人圣法兰西斯的脚踪，至终得享你所赐之恩。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: God, you have made your church rich through the poverty of blessed Francis: help us, like him, not to trust in earthly things, but to seek your heavenly gifts; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: God, you have made your church rich through the poverty of blessed Francis: help us, like him, not to trust in earthly things, but to seek your heavenly gifts; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 上帝啊，你藉着蒙福的圣法兰西斯的贫穷，使你的教会富足：求你帮助我们，效法他的榜样，轻看世间之物，而只愿寻求你天国的赏赐。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: God, by the life of blessed Francis you moved your people to a love of simple things: may we, after his example, hold lightly to the things of this world and store up for ourselves treasure in heaven; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: God, by the life of blessed Francis you moved your people to a love of simple things: may we, after his example, hold lightly to the things of this world and store up for ourselves treasure in heaven; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 上帝啊，你藉着蒙福的圣法兰西斯的生活，使你的子民爱好朴素：求你使我们效法他的榜样，不为自己积攒地上的财宝，而只愿积攒财宝在天上。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: Lord Jesus, in your servant Francis you displayed the wonderful power of the cross: help us always to follow you in the way of the cross, and give us strength to resist all temptation, and to you, Lord, with the Father and the Holy Spirit be all glory for ever.

segment.source: Lord Jesus, in your servant Francis you displayed the wonderful power of the cross: help us always to follow you in the way of the cross, and give us strength to resist all temptation, and to you, Lord, with the Father and the Holy Spirit be all glory for ever.
segment.target: 主耶稣，在你仆人圣法兰西斯身上，你彰显了你十字架上的奇妙能力：求你帮助我们始终跟随你十字架的道路，并赐我们能力抵挡一切试探引诱。你和圣父、圣灵，共享尊荣，永无穷尽。

unit.name: The Object

segment.source: The Object
segment.target: 总旨

unit.name: Jesus said, "Very truly, I tell you, unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains just a single grain; but if it dies, it bears much fruit. Those who love their life lose it, and those who hate their life in this world will keep it for eternal life. Whoever serves me must follow me, and where I am, there will my servant be also. Whoever serves me, the Father will honor." (John 12:24-26)

segment.source: Jesus said, "Very truly, I tell you, unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains just a single grain; but if it dies, it bears much fruit. Those who love their life lose it, and those who hate their life in this world will keep it for eternal life. Whoever serves me must follow me, and where I am, there will my servant be also. Whoever serves me, the Father will honor." (John 12:24-26)
segment.target: 耶稣说：“我实实在在地告诉你们：一粒麦子不落在地里死了，仍旧是一粒；若是死了，就结出许多子粒来。爱惜自己生命的，就失丧生命；在这世上恨恶自己生命的，就要保守生命到永生。若有人服侍我，就当跟从我；我在哪里，服侍我的人也要在那里；若有人服侍我，我父必尊重他。”（约翰福音12:24-26）

unit.name: The Object, cont'd

segment.source: The Object, cont'd
segment.target: 总旨（续）

unit.name: In the example of his own sacrifice, Jesus reveals the secret of bearing fruit. In surrendering himself to death, he becomes the source of new life. Lifted from the earth on the cross, he draws all people to himself. Clinging to life causes life to decay; the life that is freely given is eternal.

segment.source: In the example of his own sacrifice, Jesus reveals the secret of bearing fruit. In surrendering himself to death, he becomes the source of new life. Lifted from the earth on the cross, he draws all people to himself. Clinging to life causes life to decay; the life that is freely given is eternal.
segment.target: 耶稣藉着其牺牲自我的见证，向我们揭示了一粒麦子结出许多子粒这个比喻的奥秘。因他舍弃自我走向死亡，他成为了新生命的泉源。他在十字架上被高举，也吸引万人归向他。不愿被舍弃的生命至终必见朽坏，白白施予出去的生命却是恒久长存的。

unit.name: Jesus calls those who would serve him to follow his example and choose for themselves the same path of renunciation and sacrifice. To those who hear and obey he promises union with God. The object of the Society of Saint Francis is to build a community of those who accept Christ as their Lord and Master and are dedicated to him in body and spirit. They surrender their lives to him and to the service of his people. The Third Order of the Society consists of those who, while following the ordinary professions of life, feel called to dedicate their lives under a definite discipline and vows. They may be female or male, married or single, ordained or lay.

segment.source: Jesus calls those who would serve him to follow his example and choose for themselves the same path of renunciation and sacrifice. To those who hear and obey he promises union with God. The object of the Society of Saint Francis is to build a community of those who accept Christ as their Lord and Master and are dedicated to him in body and spirit. They surrender their lives to him and to the service of his people. The Third Order of the Society consists of those who, while following the ordinary professions of life, feel called to dedicate their lives under a definite discipline and vows. They may be female or male, married or single, ordained or lay.
segment.target: 耶稣呼召那些愿意服侍他的人，效法他的榜样，为自己选择与他相同的、舍弃和牺牲的道路。他也应许那些听从他命令的人，将与上帝联合。圣法兰西斯会，旨在建立一个甘愿接受基督作主和师傅的信徒团体，并乐意将自己的身体和灵魂都奉献给他。他们把自己的一生奉献给基督，也同样奉献自己去服侍他的众子民。圣法兰西斯会的第三会，由拥有不同职业的信徒组成，他们被呼召在明确的纪律与誓愿以下奉献自己的一生。他们可能是男人或女人，已婚或独身，神职人员或平信徒。

unit.name: When Saint Francis encouraged the formation of the Third Order he recognized that many are called to serve God in the spirit of Poverty, Chastity, and Obedience in everyday life (rather than in a literal acceptance of these principles as in the vows of the Brothers and Sisters of the First and Second Orders). The Rule of the Third Order is intended to enable the duties and conditions of daily living to be carried out in this spirit.

segment.source: When Saint Francis encouraged the formation of the Third Order he recognized that many are called to serve God in the spirit of Poverty, Chastity, and Obedience in everyday life (rather than in a literal acceptance of these principles as in the vows of the Brothers and Sisters of the First and Second Orders). The Rule of the Third Order is intended to enable the duties and conditions of daily living to be carried out in this spirit.
segment.target: 当圣法兰西斯建立第三会的时候，他意识到这是一群被呼召在日常生活中以守贫、忠贞、顺从的精神服侍上帝的人们（而不需从字面上严格遵守这三项原则，正如第一会和第二会的弟兄姊妹所发的誓愿）。第三会的会规，为了让我们在日常的生活责任和生活状态上，奉守并践行这一精神。

unit.name: The First Aim of the Order - To make our Lord known and loved everywhere.

segment.source: The First Aim of the Order - To make our Lord known and loved everywhere.
segment.target: 呼召意向之一：无论身处何方，让我们的主被爱和了解

unit.name: The Order is founded on the conviction that Jesus Christ is the perfect revelation of God; that true life has been made available to us through his Incarnation and Ministry, by his Cross and Resurrection, and by the sending of his Holy Spirit. The Order believes that it is the commission of the church to make the gospel known to all, and therefore accepts the duty of bringing others to know Christ, and of praying and working for the coming of the Kingdom of God.

segment.source: The Order is founded on the conviction that Jesus Christ is the perfect revelation of God; that true life has been made available to us through his Incarnation and Ministry, by his Cross and Resurrection, and by the sending of his Holy Spirit. The Order believes that it is the commission of the church to make the gospel known to all, and therefore accepts the duty of bringing others to know Christ, and of praying and working for the coming of the Kingdom of God.
segment.target: 圣法兰西斯会坚定地相信：耶稣基督就是上帝完全的启示；真实的生命已经赐给了我们，藉着他的道成肉身和在世的工作，藉着他在十字架上的牺牲和他的复活，也藉着他差遣了圣灵。我们相信，传福音给万民是上帝对教会的托付，因此我们愿意接受并承担这份责任：不断地带领他人认识基督，为上帝的国降临而不懈地祈祷、工作。

unit.name: The First Aim, cont'd

segment.source: The First Aim, cont'd
segment.target: 呼召意向之一（续）

unit.name: The primary aim for us as tertiaries is therefore to make Christ known. This shapes our lives and attitudes to reflect the obedience of those whom our Lord chose to be with him and sent out as his witnesses. Like them, by word and example, we bear witness to Christ in our own immediate environment and pray and work for the fulfillment of his command to make disciples of all nations.

segment.source: The primary aim for us as tertiaries is therefore to make Christ known. This shapes our lives and attitudes to reflect the obedience of those whom our Lord chose to be with him and sent out as his witnesses. Like them, by word and example, we bear witness to Christ in our own immediate environment and pray and work for the fulfillment of his command to make disciples of all nations.
segment.target: 作为第三会会友，我们首要的呼召意向就是让基督被了解。这要求我们的生活方式和处世态度，都能够效法众圣徒的榜样，他们为主所选召而努力跟从他、为他作见证。我们也当如此，藉着我们的言语和行为，在当下的生活环境中见证基督，通过祈祷、工作，来践行他的命令：使万民作我的门徒。

unit.name: The Second Aim - To spread the spirit of love and harmony

segment.source: The Second Aim - To spread the spirit of love and harmony
segment.target: 呼召意向之二：推动爱与合一的精神

unit.name: The Order sets out, in the name of Christ, to break down barriers between people and to seek equality for all. We accept as our second aim the spreading of a spirit of love and harmony among all people. We are pledged to fight against the ignorance, pride, and prejudice that breed injustice or partiality of any kind.

segment.source: The Order sets out, in the name of Christ, to break down barriers between people and to seek equality for all. We accept as our second aim the spreading of a spirit of love and harmony among all people. We are pledged to fight against the ignorance, pride, and prejudice that breed injustice or partiality of any kind.
segment.target: 圣法兰西斯会，奉基督之名，致力于打破人与人之间的任何障碍，争取众人平等。我们把在众人中间推动爱与合一的精神，作为我们第二个呼召意向。我们决意反对由于无知、骄傲、偏见而导致的任何形式的有失公平、有损正义的行为。

unit.name: The Second Aim, cont'd

segment.source: The Second Aim, cont'd
segment.target: 呼召意向之二（续）

unit.name: Members of the Third Order fight against all such injustice in the name of Christ, in whom there can be neither Jew nor Greek, slave nor free, male nor female; for in him all are one. Our chief object is to reflect that openness to all which was characteristic of Jesus. This can only be achieved in a spirit of chastity, which sees others as belonging to God and not as a means of self-fulfillment.

segment.source: Members of the Third Order fight against all such injustice in the name of Christ, in whom there can be neither Jew nor Greek, slave nor free, male nor female; for in him all are one. Our chief object is to reflect that openness to all which was characteristic of Jesus. This can only be achieved in a spirit of chastity, which sees others as belonging to God and not as a means of self-fulfillment.
segment.target: 第三会会友，奉基督之名，反对一切有损正义的行为，在基督内，并不分犹太人或希腊人、为奴的或自主的、男人或女人，因为在他里面众人本为一。我们的主要意向，是面对所有人都抱以开放的胸怀，这同样也是耶稣的品格。这种品格，只有在纯洁的心灵里才能得以实现，在这里，所有的一切都被视作是属于上帝的，而非当作是实现自我价值的手段。

unit.name: As Tertiaries, we are prepared not only to speak out for social justice and international peace, but to put these principles into practice in our own lives, cheerfully facing any scorn or persecution to which this may lead.

segment.source: As Tertiaries, we are prepared not only to speak out for social justice and international peace, but to put these principles into practice in our own lives, cheerfully facing any scorn or persecution to which this may lead.
segment.target: 作为第三会会友，我们所要预备去做的，不仅是为社会公义和国际和平发表言论，也应将这些道理在我们各自的生活中付诸实践，并欣然面对由此招致的任何轻蔑或逼迫。

unit.name: The Third Aim - To live simply

segment.source: The Third Aim - To live simply
segment.target: 呼召意向之三：实践简朴的生活方式

unit.name: The first Christians surrendered completely to our Lord and recklessly gave all that they had, offering the world a new vision of a society in which a fresh attitude was taken towards material possessions. This vision was renewed by Saint Francis when he chose Lady Poverty as his bride, desiring that all barriers set up by privilege based on wealth should be overcome by love. This is the inspiration for the third aim of the Society, to live simply.

segment.source: The first Christians surrendered completely to our Lord and recklessly gave all that they had, offering the world a new vision of a society in which a fresh attitude was taken towards material possessions. This vision was renewed by Saint Francis when he chose Lady Poverty as his bride, desiring that all barriers set up by privilege based on wealth should be overcome by love. This is the inspiration for the third aim of the Society, to live simply.
segment.target: 早期的基督徒完全顺从主，心甘情愿地舍弃他们一切所有的，并为世界勾勒了一个不同以往的社会愿景，在这里人们以全新的态度面对物质财富。这个愿景，被圣法兰西斯所重申，就在他决定迎娶贫穷女士为妻的时候，他希望用爱来克胜因财富特权而造成的所有障碍。正因为此，圣法兰西斯会的第三个呼召意向，就是过朴素、简单的生活。

unit.name: The Third Aim, cont'd

segment.source: The Third Aim, cont'd
segment.target: 呼召意向之三（续）

unit.name: Although we possess property and earn money to support ourselves and our families, we show ourselves to be true followers of Christ and of Saint Francis by our readiness to live simply and to share with others. We recognize that some of our members may be called to a literal following of Saint Francis in a life of extreme simplicity. All of us, however, accept that we avoid luxury and waste, and regard our possessions as being held in trust for God.

segment.source: Although we possess property and earn money to support ourselves and our families, we show ourselves to be true followers of Christ and of Saint Francis by our readiness to live simply and to share with others. We recognize that some of our members may be called to a literal following of Saint Francis in a life of extreme simplicity. All of us, however, accept that we avoid luxury and waste, and regard our possessions as being held in trust for God.
segment.target: 虽然我们拥有财产并挣钱养活自己和我们的家庭，但我们依然可以通过心甘情愿地过朴素、简单的生活以及周济他人，来表明我们是基督和圣法兰西斯的真实追随者。我们要认识到，我们中间的部分会友可能被呼召从字面上严格效法圣法兰西斯的样式，过绝对贫穷的生活。然而，我们所有人都需要奉守避免奢侈、浪费的原则，把我们所拥有的钱财视作是上帝托付我们代管的。

unit.name: Personal spending is limited to what is necessary for our health and well-being and that of our dependents. We aim to stay free from all attachment to wealth, keeping ourselves constantly aware of the poverty in the world and its claim on us. We are concerned more for the generosity that gives all, rather than the value of poverty in itself. In this way we reflect in spirit the acceptance of Jesus' challenge to sell all, give to the poor, and follow him.

segment.source: Personal spending is limited to what is necessary for our health and well-being and that of our dependents. We aim to stay free from all attachment to wealth, keeping ourselves constantly aware of the poverty in the world and its claim on us. We are concerned more for the generosity that gives all, rather than the value of poverty in itself. In this way we reflect in spirit the acceptance of Jesus' challenge to sell all, give to the poor, and follow him.
segment.target: 个人消费应仅限于那些关系到我们自己和我们的家人健康、安定的基本必备品。我们乐意摆脱一切对于财富的依赖，使我们不断意识到世界上的穷困以及我们对其所当尽的责任。相比贫穷本身所具有的价值，我们更当在乎施予一切时的慷慨。通过这样的方式，我们在心灵上也接受着来自耶稣的挑战：变卖一切所有的分给穷人，然后跟从他。

unit.name: The Three Ways of Service

segment.source: The Three Ways of Service
segment.target: 三种服侍方式

unit.name: Tertiaries desire to be conformed to the image of Jesus Christ, whom we serve in the three ways of Prayer, Study, and Work. In the life of the Order as a whole these three ways must each find full and balanced expression, but it is not to be expected that all members devote themselves equally to each of them. Each individual's service varies according to his/her abilities and circumstances, yet the member's personal rule of life includes each of the three ways.

segment.source: Tertiaries desire to be conformed to the image of Jesus Christ, whom we serve in the three ways of Prayer, Study, and Work. In the life of the Order as a whole these three ways must each find full and balanced expression, but it is not to be expected that all members devote themselves equally to each of them. Each individual's service varies according to his/her abilities and circumstances, yet the member's personal rule of life includes each of the three ways.
segment.target: 第三会会友，渴望效法耶稣基督的样式，通过三种方式服侍他，即祈祷、学习和工作。在第三会的生活中，这三种方式本是一个整体，应当全面且平衡地表达出来，然而，这并非是要求所有会友都程度相当地完成这三项。每一个人的服侍因其能力和所处环境而不尽相同，但每一个会友的个人生活准则都必须包括这三种服侍方式。

unit.name: The First Way of Service - Prayer

segment.source: The First Way of Service - Prayer
segment.target: 服侍方式之一：祈祷

unit.name: Tertiaries seek to live in an atmosphere of praise and prayer. We aim to be constantly aware of God's presence, so that we may indeed pray without ceasing. Our ever deepening devotion to the indwelling Christ is a source of strength and joy. It is Christ's love that inspires us to service, and strengthens us for sacrifice.

segment.source: Tertiaries seek to live in an atmosphere of praise and prayer. We aim to be constantly aware of God's presence, so that we may indeed pray without ceasing. Our ever deepening devotion to the indwelling Christ is a source of strength and joy. It is Christ's love that inspires us to service, and strengthens us for sacrifice.
segment.target: 第三会会友，应努力营造赞美与祈祷的生活环境。我们应当不断地意识到上帝的临在，并因此在生活中不住地祈祷。我们也不断地借助祈祷，加深对于内住在我们里面的基督的敬虔与热爱，这是我们一切力量和喜乐的泉源。正是基督的爱，激励我们去服侍他人，鼓舞我们勇敢地奉献自我。

unit.name: The First Way of Service, cont'd

segment.source: The First Way of Service, cont'd
segment.target: 服侍方式之一（续）

unit.name: The heart of our prayer is the Eucharist, in which we share with other Christians the renewal of our union with our Lord and Savior in his sacrifice, remembering his death and receiving his spiritual food.

segment.source: The heart of our prayer is the Eucharist, in which we share with other Christians the renewal of our union with our Lord and Savior in his sacrifice, remembering his death and receiving his spiritual food.
segment.target: 我们祈祷的核心就是圣餐，在其中，我们与其他基督徒共同分享、重申因我们的主和救主的牺牲而与他建立的联合，记念他的受难，领受他的灵粮。

unit.name: Tertiaries recognize the power of intercessory prayer for furthering the purposes of Gods' kingdom, and therefore seek a deepening communion with God in personal devotion, and constantly intercede for the needs of his church and his world. Those of us who have much time at our disposal give prayer a large part in our daily lives. Those of us with less time must not fail to see the importance of prayer and to guard the time we have allotted to it from interruption. Lastly, we are encouraged to avail ourselves of the sacrament of Reconciliation, through which the burden of past sin and failure is lifted and peace and hope restored.

segment.source: Tertiaries recognize the power of intercessory prayer for furthering the purposes of Gods' kingdom, and therefore seek a deepening communion with God in personal devotion, and constantly intercede for the needs of his church and his world. Those of us who have much time at our disposal give prayer a large part in our daily lives. Those of us with less time must not fail to see the importance of prayer and to guard the time we have allotted to it from interruption. Lastly, we are encouraged to avail ourselves of the sacrament of Reconciliation, through which the burden of past sin and failure is lifted and peace and hope restored.
segment.target: 第三会会友，承认为了上帝的国度所作的代祷的功效，因此，在个人祈祷中，我们寻求与上帝更加深入的相交，不断地为他的教会和世界的需要代祷。我们中间的一些会友，拥有大量时间可供自己支配，他们日常生活中的大部分时间被用于祈祷。对于另外一些会友，可支配的时间很少，切记万勿忽视祈祷的重要性，同时应当保证有限的祈祷时间不被其它任何干扰所中断。最后，我们也应当鼓励以悔罪复合圣事的方式，解除我们因过去的罪与过失而负的重担，重获在基督里的平安与盼望。

unit.name: The Second Way of Service - Study

segment.source: The Second Way of Service - Study
segment.target: 服侍方式之二：学习

unit.name: "And this is eternal life: that they may know you the only true God, and Jesus Christ whom you have sent." (John 17:3(NRSV)) True knowledge is knowledge of God. Tertiaries therefore give priority to devotional study of scripture as one of the chief means of attaining that knowledge of God which leads to eternal life.

segment.source: "And this is eternal life: that they may know you the only true God, and Jesus Christ whom you have sent." (John 17:3(NRSV)) True knowledge is knowledge of God. Tertiaries therefore give priority to devotional study of scripture as one of the chief means of attaining that knowledge of God which leads to eternal life.
segment.target: “认识你独一的真上帝，并且认识你所差来的耶稣基督，这就是永生。”（约翰福音17:3）真正的知识是认识上帝，这也是人们获得永生的唯一道路。第三会会友优先以研习圣经作为一种认识上帝的主要方式。

unit.name: The Second Way of Service, cont'd

segment.source: The Second Way of Service, cont'd
segment.target: 服侍方式之二（续）

unit.name: As well as the devotional study of Scripture, we all recognize our Christian responsibility to pursue other branches of study, both sacred and secular. In particular, some of us accept the duty of contributing, through research and writing, to a better understanding of the church's mission in the world: the application of Christian principles to the use and distribution of wealth; questions concerning justice and peace; and of all other questions concerning the life of faith.

segment.source: As well as the devotional study of Scripture, we all recognize our Christian responsibility to pursue other branches of study, both sacred and secular. In particular, some of us accept the duty of contributing, through research and writing, to a better understanding of the church's mission in the world: the application of Christian principles to the use and distribution of wealth; questions concerning justice and peace; and of all other questions concerning the life of faith.
segment.target: 除了认真研习圣经，我们也当意识到，作为基督徒，我们也有责任继续开展在其它方面的学习，无论是基督宗教的，还是世俗性的。特别是我们中间的一部分会友，立志通过研究和写作，帮助他人更好地了解教会在世界上的使命：如基督教信仰在财富使用和分配方面的教导、涉及正义与和平的问题，以及所有其它与信仰生活相关的问题。

unit.name: The Third Way of Service - Work

segment.source: The Third Way of Service - Work
segment.target: 服侍方式之三：工作

unit.name: Jesus took on himself the form of a servant. He came not to be served, but to serve. He went about doing good: healing the sick, preaching good news to the poor, and binding up the broken hearted.

segment.source: Jesus took on himself the form of a servant. He came not to be served, but to serve. He went about doing good: healing the sick, preaching good news to the poor, and binding up the broken hearted.
segment.target: 耶稣虚己，取了奴仆的形象。他来，不是要受人的服侍，乃是要服侍人。他在各处行善，医治病患，传喜讯给贫穷人，安慰破碎的心灵。

unit.name: The Third Way of Service, cont'd

segment.source: The Third Way of Service, cont'd
segment.target: 服侍方式之三（续）

unit.name: Tertiaries endeavor to serve others in active work. We try to find expression for each of the three aims of the Order in our lives, and whenever possible actively help others who are engaged in similar work. The chief form of service which we have to offer is to reflect the love of Christ, who, in his beauty and power, is the inspiration and joy of our lives.

segment.source: Tertiaries endeavor to serve others in active work. We try to find expression for each of the three aims of the Order in our lives, and whenever possible actively help others who are engaged in similar work. The chief form of service which we have to offer is to reflect the love of Christ, who, in his beauty and power, is the inspiration and joy of our lives.
segment.target: 第三会会友，应当积极工作，竭力服侍他人。我们努力让第三会的每一个呼召意向都能在我们的生活中得以体现，并尽可能地积极帮助从事类似工作的其他人。我们提供服侍的主要方式，就是彰显基督的爱，他的能力和美善鼓舞着我们，也成为我们生活中喜乐的泉源。

unit.name: The Three Notes of the Order

segment.source: The Three Notes of the Order
segment.target: 团体生活的三种特征

unit.name: Humility, love, and joy are the three notes which mark the lives of Tertiaries. When these characteristics are evident throughout the Order, its work will be fruitful. Without them, all that it attempts will be in vain.

segment.source: Humility, love, and joy are the three notes which mark the lives of Tertiaries. When these characteristics are evident throughout the Order, its work will be fruitful. Without them, all that it attempts will be in vain.
segment.target: 谦卑、仁爱、喜乐是第三会生活的三种特征。当我们的团体充满了这样的品格，服侍才真正会有果效，否则，一切的尝试都只会成为徒劳。

unit.name: The First Note - Humility

segment.source: The First Note - Humility
segment.target: 特征之一：谦卑

unit.name: We always keep before us the example of Christ, who emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, and who, on the last night of his life, humbly washed his disciples' feet. We likewise seek to serve one another with humility.

segment.source: We always keep before us the example of Christ, who emptied himself, taking the form of a servant, and who, on the last night of his life, humbly washed his disciples' feet. We likewise seek to serve one another with humility.
segment.target: 我们总要效法基督的榜样，他虚己，取了奴仆的形象，并在他人生中的最后一夜，自甘卑微地为门徒们洗脚，我们也应当同样谦卑地彼此服侍。

unit.name: The First Note, cont'd

segment.source: The First Note, cont'd
segment.target: 特征之一（续）

unit.name: Humility confesses that we have nothing that we have not received and admits the fact of our insufficiency and our dependence upon God. It is the basis of all Christian virtues. Saint Bernard of Clairvaux said, "No spiritual house can stand for a moment except on the foundation of humility." It is the first condition of a joyful life within any community.

segment.source: Humility confesses that we have nothing that we have not received and admits the fact of our insufficiency and our dependence upon God. It is the basis of all Christian virtues. Saint Bernard of Clairvaux said, "No spiritual house can stand for a moment except on the foundation of humility." It is the first condition of a joyful life within any community.
segment.target: 谦卑，就是承认我们一无所有，也一无所获，承认我们缺乏而必须倚靠上帝的事实。这是基督徒一切美德的基础，正如克莱尔沃的圣伯尔纳德所说：除非以谦卑作基石，否则没有一间灵屋能够存立片时。谦卑也是在任何团体内能够喜乐生活的首要条件。

unit.name: The faults that we see in others are the subject of prayer rather than of criticism. We take care to cast out the beam from our own eye before offering to remove the speck from another's. We are ready to accept the lowest place when asked, and to volunteer to take it. Nevertheless, when asked to undertake work of which we feel unworthy or incapable, we do not shrink from it on the grounds of humility, but confidently attempt it through the power that is made perfect in weakness.

segment.source: The faults that we see in others are the subject of prayer rather than of criticism. We take care to cast out the beam from our own eye before offering to remove the speck from another's. We are ready to accept the lowest place when asked, and to volunteer to take it. Nevertheless, when asked to undertake work of which we feel unworthy or incapable, we do not shrink from it on the grounds of humility, but confidently attempt it through the power that is made perfect in weakness.
segment.target: 当我们看到他人的过错，我们应当做的是祈祷，而非指摘。我们要先去掉自己眼中的梁木，然后再去掉他人眼中的刺。我们应当预备好去接纳那些需要帮助的最卑微的所在，并乐意如此。而且，当我们被要求去承担一些我们认为不值得或无能为力的工作时，因着谦卑的缘故，我们仍然不应退缩，而是应当凭借上帝那在人的软弱上显出完全的能力，满怀信心地努力完成。

unit.name: The Second Note - Love

segment.source: The Second Note - Love
segment.target: 特征之二：仁爱

unit.name: Jesus said, "I give you a new commandment: love one another. Just as I have loved you, you also should love one another. By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another." (John 13:34 - 35(NRSV)) Love is the distinguishing feature of all true disciples of Christ who wish to dedicate themselves to him as his servants.

segment.source: Jesus said, "I give you a new commandment: love one another. Just as I have loved you, you also should love one another. By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another." (John 13:34 - 35(NRSV)) Love is the distinguishing feature of all true disciples of Christ who wish to dedicate themselves to him as his servants.
segment.target: 耶稣说：“我赐给你们一条新命令，乃是叫你们彼此相爱。我怎样爱你们，你们也要怎样相爱。你们若有彼此相爱的心，众人因此就认出你们是我的门徒了。”（约翰福音13:34-35）爱是所有乐意奉献自己归入基督、作他忠实仆人的真正基督门徒所当有的特征。

unit.name: The Second Note, cont'd

segment.source: The Second Note, cont'd
segment.target: 特征之二（续）

unit.name: Therefore, we seek to love all those to whom we are bound by ties of family or friendship. Our love for them increases as our love for Christ grows deeper. We have a special love and affection for members of the Third Order, praying for each other individually and seeking to grow in that love. We are on our guard against anything which might injure this love, and we seek reconciliation with those from whom we are estranged. We seek the same love for those with whom we have little natural affinity, for this kind of love is not a welling up of emotion, but is a bond founded in our common union with Christ.

segment.source: Therefore, we seek to love all those to whom we are bound by ties of family or friendship. Our love for them increases as our love for Christ grows deeper. We have a special love and affection for members of the Third Order, praying for each other individually and seeking to grow in that love. We are on our guard against anything which might injure this love, and we seek reconciliation with those from whom we are estranged. We seek the same love for those with whom we have little natural affinity, for this kind of love is not a welling up of emotion, but is a bond founded in our common union with Christ.
segment.target: 因此，我们应当爱我们所有的家人和朋友。我们加深对他们的爱，正如我们对基督的爱也越来越深。我们对第三会的其他会友怀有特殊的爱与情感，我们应当彼此代祷，并寻求在这爱里共同长进。我们应当警惕、避免对这爱将构成伤害的任何可能，也当与那些我们所疏远的人寻求和解。此外，我们也应当同样爱那些与我们没有过多密切关系的人，因为这爱并非是一种情感的涌现，而是因着我们与基督联合所当尽的责任。

unit.name: The Third Order is a Christian community whose members, although varied in race, education, and character, are bound into a living whole through the love we share in Christ. This unity of all who believe in him will become, as our Lord intended, a witness to the world of his divine mission. In our relationship with those outside the Order, we show the same Christ-like love, and gladly give of ourselves, remembering that love is measured by sacrifice.

segment.source: The Third Order is a Christian community whose members, although varied in race, education, and character, are bound into a living whole through the love we share in Christ. This unity of all who believe in him will become, as our Lord intended, a witness to the world of his divine mission. In our relationship with those outside the Order, we show the same Christ-like love, and gladly give of ourselves, remembering that love is measured by sacrifice.
segment.target: 第三会作为一个基督徒团体，其中的成员，尽管种族、教育程度、性格特点各不相同，但却因着在基督里的爱而连结成一个富有生命力的整体。这种基督信仰者的合一，正如我们的主所希望的，将会成为他神圣使命的美好见证。在面对那些团体以外的人们时，我们也应当同样表达出相似于基督的爱，并乐意奉献自身，服侍他们，我们应当记住的是，爱总需要经历牺牲。

unit.name: The Third Note - Joy

segment.source: The Third Note - Joy
segment.target: 特征之三：喜乐

unit.name: Tertiaries, rejoicing in the Lord always, show in our lives the grace and beauty of divine joy. We remember that we follow the Son of Man, who came eating and drinking, who loved the birds and the flowers, who blessed little children, who was a friend to tax collectors and sinners, and who sat at the tables of both the rich and the poor. We delight in fun and laughter, rejoicing in God's world, its beauty and its living creatures, calling nothing common or unclean. We mix freely with all people, ready to bind up the broken-hearted and to bring joy into the lives of others. We carry within us an inner peace and happiness which others may perceive, even if they do not know its source.

segment.source: Tertiaries, rejoicing in the Lord always, show in our lives the grace and beauty of divine joy. We remember that we follow the Son of Man, who came eating and drinking, who loved the birds and the flowers, who blessed little children, who was a friend to tax collectors and sinners, and who sat at the tables of both the rich and the poor. We delight in fun and laughter, rejoicing in God's world, its beauty and its living creatures, calling nothing common or unclean. We mix freely with all people, ready to bind up the broken-hearted and to bring joy into the lives of others. We carry within us an inner peace and happiness which others may perceive, even if they do not know its source.
segment.target: 第三会会友，总要在主里保持喜乐，并在我们的生活中彰显出这神圣喜乐的恩典与美善。我们应当记住，我们所跟随的人子，他曾经与人们一同吃喝，他喜爱雀鸟和小花，他为小孩子们祝福，他与税吏和罪人成为朋友，他与众人一同坐席，无论对方或富或穷。我们应当热爱欢乐与笑声，热爱上帝创造的世界，热爱它的美好和居于其间的众生，上帝所创造的，没有一样应被称作是不起眼的或不洁净的。我们应当慷慨地与众人交往，安慰破碎的心灵，为他人的生活注入喜乐。我们的内心也当常怀平安与喜乐，即便他人不知道它们来自何方，却也可以从我们身上察觉到。

unit.name: The Third Note, cont'd

segment.source: The Third Note, cont'd
segment.target: 特征之三（续）

unit.name: This joy is a divine gift, coming from union with God in Christ. It is still there even in times of darkness and difficulty, giving cheerful courage in the face of disappointment, and an inward serenity and confidence through sickness and suffering. Those who possess it can rejoice in weakness, insults, hardship, and persecutions for Christs' sake; for when we are weak, then we are strong.

segment.source: This joy is a divine gift, coming from union with God in Christ. It is still there even in times of darkness and difficulty, giving cheerful courage in the face of disappointment, and an inward serenity and confidence through sickness and suffering. Those who possess it can rejoice in weakness, insults, hardship, and persecutions for Christs' sake; for when we are weak, then we are strong.
segment.target: 这喜乐是一份神圣的恩赐，源于在基督里与上帝的联合。即便在黑暗、困苦之时，它也依然存在。面对失望，它带来令人欢愉的勇气；经历病患与苦难，它给人以内心的平静和信心。拥有它的人们，为着基督的缘故，也可欣然面对一切的软弱、凌辱、困苦和逼迫，因为我们什么时候软弱，什么时候就刚强了。

unit.name: The Three Notes

segment.source: The Three Notes
segment.target: 三种特征（总结）

unit.name: The humility, love and joy, which mark the lives of Tertiaries, are all God-given graces. They can never be obtained by human effort. They are gifts of the Holy Spirit. The purpose of Christ is to work miracles through people who are willing to be emptied of self and to surrender to him. We then become channels of grace through whom his mighty work is done.

segment.source: The humility, love and joy, which mark the lives of Tertiaries, are all God-given graces. They can never be obtained by human effort. They are gifts of the Holy Spirit. The purpose of Christ is to work miracles through people who are willing to be emptied of self and to surrender to him. We then become channels of grace through whom his mighty work is done.
segment.target: 谦卑、仁爱和喜乐，第三会生活的三种特征，都是上帝所赐的恩典。它们无法通过人的努力而实现。它们都是圣灵的恩赐。基督要在那些愿意舍弃自我、顺从他的人身上施行神迹。而我们，对于那些基督大能的作为已然成就在他们身上的人来说，则要成为传递恩典的途径。

unit.name: The Principles of the Third Order, a portion of which is set for reflection each day, are based on the Rule of the Christa Seva Sangha from Poona in India. This community, formed in 1922, was inspired both by the Gospel of Christ and the way of life in an Indian Ashram. This community of married and single people, ordained and lay, led by Fr Jack Winslow, lived a common life as equals.

segment.source: The Principles of the Third Order, a portion of which is set for reflection each day, are based on the Rule of the Christa Seva Sangha from Poona in India. This community, formed in 1922, was inspired both by the Gospel of Christ and the way of life in an Indian Ashram. This community of married and single people, ordained and lay, led by Fr Jack Winslow, lived a common life as equals.
segment.target: 供每日反省的第三会准则，是以印度浦那的基督忠仆会（Christa Seva Sangha）会规为蓝本编订而成。这个团体创立于1922年，受感于基督福音和印度静修处的生活方式。这个团体由已婚及独身者、神职人员及平信徒组成，由杰克·温斯洛神父带领，过着平等的公共生活。

unit.name: In 1928 the Rule was revised under the guidance of Fr Algy Robertson and some aspects of that Rule can also be found in The Third Order Principles.

segment.source: In 1928 the Rule was revised under the guidance of Fr Algy Robertson and some aspects of that Rule can also be found in The Third Order Principles.
segment.target: 1928年，会规在阿尔吉·罗伯逊神父的指导下进行修订，该会规的某些方面也可以在第三会准则中找到。

unit.name: We give thanks to God for the Principles of the Third Order that inspire us in the Franciscan way of following Jesus.

segment.source: We give thanks to God for the Principles of the Third Order that inspire us in the Franciscan way of following Jesus.
segment.target: 我们感谢上帝赐下第三会准则，激励我们以圣法兰西斯圣召之路来跟随耶稣。

unit.name: Reflect on which portion has particularly encouraged or challenged you in this past month.

segment.source: Reflect on which portion has particularly encouraged or challenged you in this past month.
segment.target: 反省在过往的一个月中，准则的哪一部分，特别鼓舞或挑战了你。

segment.target: 为那些在过去一年中解除第三会誓愿的人祈祷：

unit.name: God, we give you thanks for the Third Order of the Society of St. Francis. Grant, we pray, that being knit together in community and prayer, we your servants may glorify your holy name after the example of Saint Francis, and win others to your love; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: God, we give you thanks for the Third Order of the Society of St. Francis. Grant, we pray, that being knit together in community and prayer, we your servants may glorify your holy name after the example of Saint Francis, and win others to your love; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 上帝啊，我们为圣法兰西斯第三会而感谢你。我们祈求你，在团体和祈祷中，保守我们彼此合而为一，使我们——你的众仆人可以效法圣法兰西斯的榜样，荣耀你的圣名，并赢取他人归入你的圣爱之中。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

segment.target: 为印度第三会会友祈祷:

unit.name: Prayer of the day:

segment.source: Prayer of the day:
segment.target: 本日祝文

unit.name: Everliving God, we thank you for the brothers by whose martyrdom the beginnings of the Franciscan Order were sanctified: grant that following their example and strengthened by their fellowship we may give our lives to your service, even unto death, and share with them your gifts of eternal life; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Everliving God, we thank you for the brothers by whose martyrdom the beginnings of the Franciscan Order were sanctified: grant that following their example and strengthened by their fellowship we may give our lives to your service, even unto death, and share with them your gifts of eternal life; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 永生的上帝，我们为这首批殉道的小弟兄感谢你，因他们忠心至死，你使建立之初的圣法兰西斯会得到圣化：求主叫我们效法他们的榜样，因他们的团契得力量，一生服事你，至终也得与他们同享你所赐的永生。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Lord God, you kept the pioneers of the revival of the Franciscan life in the Anglican Communion faithful to Christ's pattern of poverty and humility: may we, inspired by their example, live in fidelity to our calling and come to the perfection you have shown us in your Son Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Lord God, you kept the pioneers of the revival of the Franciscan life in the Anglican Communion faithful to Christ's pattern of poverty and humility: may we, inspired by their example, live in fidelity to our calling and come to the perfection you have shown us in your Son Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 主上帝，你保守那些在普世安立甘教会内，复兴圣法兰西斯会传统的开拓者们，坚固他们的信心，效法基督贫穷、谦卑的生活样式：求主叫我们因他们的典范得鼓励，忠于我们的圣召，至终在你的圣子，我们的主耶稣基督内得以完全。圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Faithful God, you filled Brother Geoffrey with divine compassion and an all-embracing trust. Help us to persist in compassion and faithfulness and so imitate and honour your Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: Faithful God, you filled Brother Geoffrey with divine compassion and an all-embracing trust. Help us to persist in compassion and faithfulness and so imitate and honour your Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 信实的上帝，你施恩给杰弗里弟兄，使他爱好怜悯，全心信靠。求主帮助我们，也能常怀怜悯，持守忠心，这样，我们就可以效法并荣耀你的圣子，我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: Merciful and loving God, through your gracious goodness you brought Margaret of Cortona from the path of sin to the way of salvation; in the same mercy may we who have often gone astray also come to repentance and be recreated in your image and likeness; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Merciful and loving God, through your gracious goodness you brought Margaret of Cortona from the path of sin to the way of salvation; in the same mercy may we who have often gone astray also come to repentance and be recreated in your image and likeness; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 满有怜悯和慈爱的上帝，因着你的恩慈，你带领科尔多纳的玛格利特，转离罪恶，得蒙救赎：求主也同样施恩给我们这些时常迷失的人，赐我们悔改的心，使我们生命中重新显示出主的形像。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God of glory, who gave your servant Bernardine a most tender love of the Holy Name of Jesus, grant that we may always be alive with the spirit of your love; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: God of glory, who gave your servant Bernardine a most tender love of the Holy Name of Jesus, grant that we may always be alive with the spirit of your love; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 荣耀的上帝，因耶稣圣名，你向你的仆人伯尔纳定大施怜爱，求主也常赐你慈爱之灵，充满我们。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Loving God, you inspired Jack Winslow to look with the eyelids of the dawn, to preach the Gospel and live its principles in community. Deepen our love for one another and so bring you glory in your Son Jesus Christ.

segment.source: Loving God, you inspired Jack Winslow to look with the eyelids of the dawn, to preach the Gospel and live its principles in community. Deepen our love for one another and so bring you glory in your Son Jesus Christ.
segment.target: 慈爱的上帝，你叫晨光发现，感化杰克·温斯洛，使他看见并明白你的旨意，在团体中传扬、践行你的福音。求主也加增我们彼此之间的爱，使我们在你的圣子耶稣基督内，得以荣耀你的圣名。

unit.name: Lord God, through the powerful preaching of Antony of Padua many were brought out of darkness and error into the clear light of your gospel: may we keep the faith which he taught and by word and example share it with others; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Lord God, through the powerful preaching of Antony of Padua many were brought out of darkness and error into the clear light of your gospel: may we keep the faith which he taught and by word and example share it with others; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 主上帝，你将讲道的能力赐给帕多瓦的圣安东尼，藉着他的宣道，你带领众人脱离罪恶的黑暗，进入你福音的光明：求主使我们能持守他所传的真道，并以言行向万民宣扬主的福音。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Everlasting God, we praise you that you have given light to your church by the witness of Bonaventure: in our day, may your Holy Spirit raise up people who by their teaching and guidance will show the fullness of your truth; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Everlasting God, we praise you that you have given light to your church by the witness of Bonaventure: in our day, may your Holy Spirit raise up people who by their teaching and guidance will show the fullness of your truth; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 永恒的上帝，我们赞美你，因为你藉着波拿文都拉的见证，赐亮光普照你的教会：求主圣灵在我们当中兴起你的仆人，藉着他们的训诲和带领，引导我们进入你全备的真理。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God of love, who filled your servant John Vianney with zeal as a priest, pastor, and confessor: help us, by your grace, to win all our brothers and sisters for Christ and to share with them in eternal glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: God of love, who filled your servant John Vianney with zeal as a priest, pastor, and confessor: help us, by your grace, to win all our brothers and sisters for Christ and to share with them in eternal glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 慈爱的上帝，你兴起你的仆人约翰•维雅内，使他大发热心，成为堂区司铎、牧者和告解神师：求主帮助我们，靠着主的恩典，也能够赢取一切属主的人——我们的弟兄姊妹归向基督，至终得与他们同享永远的荣耀。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Gracious God, you came among us as servant of all; may we, like our sister Clare, forget ourselves in love for you and in compassion for others. We ask this through Christ our Lord.

segment.source: Gracious God, you came among us as servant of all; may we, like our sister Clare, forget ourselves in love for you and in compassion for others. We ask this through Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 恩慈的上帝，你来到我们中间，作了众罪人的奴仆，求主使我们也能像我们的姊妹克莱尔那样，为爱主和爱邻舍的缘故，甘愿舍弃自我。这都是靠着我们的主基督。

unit.name: Lord God, in the holiness of blessed Clare you have given a clear light to shine in the darkness of the world. Give us grace to follow her footsteps, that we may at last rejoice with her in the clear light of your eternal glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: Lord God, in the holiness of blessed Clare you have given a clear light to shine in the darkness of the world. Give us grace to follow her footsteps, that we may at last rejoice with her in the clear light of your eternal glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 主上帝，因着蒙福的圣克莱尔的圣洁，你赐下明光照在这世间的黑暗里。求主施恩，叫我们跟随圣克莱尔的脚踪，至终也得与她一同在你永远荣耀的真光中欢喜快乐。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: All powerful and everliving God, we praise you that you turned our weakness into strength: as you called Maximilian Kolbe to give his life for a brother, grant us the grace to live in faithful witness to you, even unto death; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: All powerful and everliving God, we praise you that you turned our weakness into strength: as you called Maximilian Kolbe to give his life for a brother, grant us the grace to live in faithful witness to you, even unto death; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 全能永生的上帝，我们赞美你，因为你使我们软弱变为刚强：正如你呼召马希连·高比为弟兄舍命，求主施恩，使我们也能够忠心至死，为主作的见证。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God of love, you chose the blessed Virgin Mary to be the mother of your only Son: grant that we who have been redeemed by his blood, may share with her the glory of your eternal kingdom; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: God of love, you chose the blessed Virgin Mary to be the mother of your only Son: grant that we who have been redeemed by his blood, may share with her the glory of your eternal kingdom; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 上帝啊，蒙福的童贞女马利亚，道成肉身的圣子耶稣的母亲，是你亲自拣选的：求主使我们既蒙圣子的宝血所救赎，就能与她同享主永恒国度的荣耀。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，三位一体的主，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: King of kings, and Lord of lords, you called your servant Louis of France to an earthly kingdom and gave him a deep love for you and your people: may we who commemorate him today be filled with your loving grace that we too may be fruitful in good works and attain the glorious crown of your saints; through the same Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: King of kings, and Lord of lords, you called your servant Louis of France to an earthly kingdom and gave him a deep love for you and your people: may we who commemorate him today be filled with your loving grace that we too may be fruitful in good works and attain the glorious crown of your saints; through the same Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 万王之王，万主之主，你曾呼召你的仆人法兰西的路易，作地上国度的掌权者，又使他热爱主，并爱主的子民：求主使我们——现今记念他的人，也能够为主慈爱的恩典所充满，叫我们在一切善事上结果子，至终可与众圣徒同得你所赐的荣耀冠冕。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God of the poor, you called Brother Douglas to care for the poor and helpless: give us grace to see our brother and sister in every person we meet and to deal generously with those in need following the example of our Brother and Lord, your Son Jesus Christ.

segment.source: God of the poor, you called Brother Douglas to care for the poor and helpless: give us grace to see our brother and sister in every person we meet and to deal generously with those in need following the example of our Brother and Lord, your Son Jesus Christ.
segment.target: 全能永生的上帝，我们赞美你，因为你使我们软弱变为刚强：正如你呼召马希连·高比为弟兄舍命，求主施恩，使我们也能够忠心至死，为主作的见证。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Almighty God, when the world was growing cold you inflamed the hearts of your people with the fire of your love; you raised up blessed Francis, bearing in his body the marks of Christ crucified: grant to us, your people, true penitence, and grace to bear the cross for love of him who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Almighty God, when the world was growing cold you inflamed the hearts of your people with the fire of your love; you raised up blessed Francis, bearing in his body the marks of Christ crucified: grant to us, your people, true penitence, and grace to bear the cross for love of him who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 全能的上帝，当这世界变得越发冷漠时，你以你的仁爱之火，叫你的子民心里火热。你兴起了蒙福的圣法兰西斯，在他身上印有基督十字架上被钉的圣痕。求主施恩，叫我们也能真心悔改，为基督的爱所吸引，甘愿背负自己的十字架。圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Almighty God, when the world was growing cold you inflamed the hearts of your people with the fire of your love; you raised up blessed Francis, bearing in his body the marks of Christ crucified: grant to us, your people, true penitence, and grace to bear the cross for love of him who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Almighty God, when the world was growing cold you inflamed the hearts of your people with the fire of your love; you raised up blessed Francis, bearing in his body the marks of Christ crucified: grant to us, your people, true penitence, and grace to bear the cross for love of him who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 全能的上帝，当这世界变得越发冷漠时，你以你的仁爱之火，叫你的子民心里火热。你兴起了蒙福的圣法兰西斯，在他身上印有基督十字架上被钉的圣痕。求主施恩，叫我们也能真心悔改，为基督的爱所吸引，甘愿背负自己的十字架。圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: God our Father, you always delight to reveal yourself to the childlike and lowly of heart: grant that, following the example of our blessed father, Francis, we may count the wisdom of this world as foolishness and know only Jesus Christ and him crucified; who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: God our Father, you always delight to reveal yourself to the childlike and lowly of heart: grant that, following the example of our blessed father, Francis, we may count the wisdom of this world as foolishness and know only Jesus Christ and him crucified; who is alive and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 我们的天父上帝，你乐意显示自己给谦卑虚己、像小孩子一样的心灵：求你帮助我们，效法蒙福的会父圣法兰西斯的榜样，将世界的智慧看为愚拙，而只愿思想耶稣基督并他钉十字架。圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Everlasting God, you have adorned your Church with splendours of the saintly followers of our holy father, Francis: grant that as we commemorate their holiness we may come at last with all the pure in heart to share the vision of your glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Everlasting God, you have adorned your Church with splendours of the saintly followers of our holy father, Francis: grant that as we commemorate their holiness we may come at last with all the pure in heart to share the vision of your glory; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 永生的上帝，藉着会父圣法兰西斯众跟随者圣洁的光辉，你亲手修理、装饰了你的教会：求主施恩，使我们这些现今记念他们圣德的人，至终也可与一切清心的人，一同得见你的荣耀。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Merciful God, who helped Elizabeth of Hungary to recognise and honour Christ in the poor: grant that we may use the prosperity of this present world for the glory of your eternal kingdom; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: Merciful God, who helped Elizabeth of Hungary to recognise and honour Christ in the poor: grant that we may use the prosperity of this present world for the glory of your eternal kingdom; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 慈悲的上帝，你曾帮助匈牙利的伊利莎白，在穷人身上认出基督，荣耀基督：求主施恩，使我们善用今世的财富，将来也可得享主永恒国度的荣耀。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。

unit.name: Creator God, your presence fills us with awe and joy. Help us, as we remember your servant Father Algy, to see your face in every one we meet, and to share with the community the joy of knowing you, through Jesus Christ our Lord.

segment.source: Creator God, your presence fills us with awe and joy. Help us, as we remember your servant Father Algy, to see your face in every one we meet, and to share with the community the joy of knowing you, through Jesus Christ our Lord.
segment.target: 创造主上帝，你的临在使我们心存敬畏和喜乐。求主帮助我们——现今记念你忠仆阿尔吉神父的人，使我们在所遇见的每个人身上，都能得见你的面，并且在团体中，分享因认识你而有的喜乐。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督。

unit.name: O God, through your Son, our Lord Jesus Christ, you have conquered sin and death. We thank you for those who have died and have gone before us marked with the sign of faith, especially the sisters and brothers of our Society. Grant us, with all the faithful departed, the sure benefits of your Son's saving passion and glorious resurrection that, in the last day, when you gather up all things in Christ, we may with them enjoy the fullness of your promises; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.

segment.source: O God, through your Son, our Lord Jesus Christ, you have conquered sin and death. We thank you for those who have died and have gone before us marked with the sign of faith, especially the sisters and brothers of our Society. Grant us, with all the faithful departed, the sure benefits of your Son's saving passion and glorious resurrection that, in the last day, when you gather up all things in Christ, we may with them enjoy the fullness of your promises; through Jesus Christ our Lord, who lives and reigns with you, in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, now and for ever.
segment.target: 上帝啊，藉着你的圣子，我们的主耶稣基督，你已经战胜了罪恶与死亡。我们为所有在信心中离世的你的仆人——特别为圣法兰西斯会诸亡者感谢你，求主施恩，藉着你圣子的受难和荣耀的复活，使我们与一切离世的忠实信徒，一同领受基督救赎大功的果效，及至日期满足，万物都俯伏在基督的权势下，也能与他们同得你所应许的满足的喜乐。这都是靠着我们的主耶稣基督，圣子和圣父、圣灵，一同永生，一同掌权，惟一上帝，永无穷尽。
